mapper.select: select c.commodity_id, c.commodity_first_picture, c.commodity_code, c.commodity_name, o.commodity_price, o.commodity_num, o.commodity_total_price, o.created_by, o.gmt_create, o.last_modified_by, o.gmt_modified, o.is_deleted, o.sort_no, o.version from t_order_detail as o left join t_commodity as c ON o.commodity_id = c.commodity_id where o.is_deleted = 0 and o.order_id = #{orderId}

select o.order_id, o.order_number, o.order_price, o.customer_id, o.order_state, o.order_date, o.receive_tel, o.order_address, o.receive_contact, o.order_remark, o.created_by, o.gmt_create, o.last_modified_by, o.gmt_modified, o.is_deleted, o.sort_no, o.version, c.customer_name from t_order as o LEFT JOIN t_customer as c ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id where o.is_deleted = 0 and o.order_id = #{orderId}
